Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking between two shopping centers along Lankshire Parkway.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road is the Hillborough Adamantine Works shop, where various artifacts of adamantine can be bought. Adamantine is one of the stronger metals in the world, second only to mithril. On the west side of the road is David's Used Books shop, where one might get lucky and find an old magic spell or an ancient scroll.
